entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
